name: Champbot-2015
tagline: A Champ-like ROV, with brief submersion capability, designed to meet the demands of the Champlain Mini Maker Faire's ChampBot Challenge  of 2015
body: Looking part Tanystropheus, part Gungan and sporting a wicked pair of drive-units on a pivoting boom, this bot is nearing completion. The head is made of a license plate and the eyes are made of ping-pong balls lit by red LEDs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
